long_description: The ergonomic Metolius Multi-Loop Contour gear sling allows for easy gear organization during technical rock climbs. Ergonomic cut rests easily across the shoulder. High density, closed-cell foam padding and ripstop nylon cover add comfort during long climbs. Multiple loops allow you to organize your gear and prevent it from sliding. Features one loop for non-protection gear such as belay devices, gloves, and pulleys.
short_description: The ergonomic Metolius Multi-Loop Contour gear sling allows for easy gear organization during technical rock climbs.
